00001 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 // FunkOS - Copyright (c) 2009, Funkenstein Software, See license.txt for details
00003 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00010 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00011 
00012 #ifndef __COLORSPACE_H_
00013 #define __COLORSPACE_H_
00014 
00015 #include "types.h"
00016 
00017 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 // Module configuration flags
00019 #define DRAW_COLOR_24BIT    0
00020 #define DRAW_COLOR_16BIT    1
00021 #define DRAW_COLOR_8BIT     0
00022 #define DRAW_COLOR_1BIT     0
00023 
00024 
00025 #if DRAW_COLOR_1BIT
00026 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 // Off or On
00028         #define COLOR                           UCHAR
00029         #define MAX_RED                         (0x01)
00030         #define MAX_GREEN                       (0x01)
00031         #define MAX_BLUE                        (0x01)
00032         #define RGB_COLOR(R,G,B)        ( (R | G | B) != 0 )
00033         #define BYTES_PER_PIXEL         (1)
00034 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 #elif DRAW_COLOR_8BIT
00036 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 //3R:2G:3B
00038         #define COLOR                           UCHAR
00039         #define MAX_RED                         (0x07)
00040         #define MAX_GREEN                       (0x03)
00041         #define MAX_BLUE                        (0x07)
00042         
00043         #define MASK_RED(R)                     (((UCHAR)R & 0x07) << 5)
00044         #define MASK_BLUE(B)            ((UCHAR)B & 0x07)
00045         #define MASK_GREEN(G)           (((UCHAR)G & 0x03) << 3)
00046         
00047         #define RGB_COLOR(R,G,B)        ( MASK_BLUE(B) | MASK_GREEN(G) | MASK_RED(R) )
00048         #define BYTES_PER_PIXEL         (1)
00049 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 #elif DRAW_COLOR_16BIT
00051 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 //5R:6G:5B
00053         #define COLOR                           USHORT
00054         #define MAX_RED                         (0x001F)
00055         #define MAX_GREEN                       (0x003F)
00056         #define MAX_BLUE                        (0x001F)
00057         
00058         #define MASK_RED(R)                     (((USHORT)R & 0x001F) << 11)
00059         #define MASK_BLUE(B)            ((USHORT)B & 0x001F)
00060         #define MASK_GREEN(G)           (((USHORT)G & 0x003F) << 5)
00061         
00062         #define RGB_COLOR(R,G,B)        ( MASK_BLUE(B) | MASK_GREEN(G) | MASK_RED(R) )
00063         #define BYTES_PER_PIXEL         (2)
00064 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 #elif DRAW_COLOR_24BIT
00066 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 //8R:8G:8B
00068         #define COLOR   ULONG
00069         #define MAX_RED                         (0x00FF)
00070         #define MAX_GREEN                       (0x00FF)
00071         #define MAX_BLUE                        (0x00FF)
00072         
00073         #define MASK_RED(R)                     ((ULONG)R & 0x00FF)
00074         #define MASK_BLUE(B)            (((ULONG)B & 0x00FF) << 16)
00075         #define MASK_GREEN(G)           (((ULONG)G & 0x00FF) << 8)
00076         
00077         #define RGB_COLOR(R,G,B)        ( MASK_BLUE(B) | MASK_GREEN(G) | MASK_RED(R) )
00078         
00079         #define BYTES_PER_PIXEL         (3)
00080 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 #else
00082         #error "Must define a color space for graphics framework"
00083 #endif
00084 
00085 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 // Primary colors
00087 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 #define COLOR_RED               RGB_COLOR(MAX_RED,              0,                              0)
00089 #define COLOR_BLUE              RGB_COLOR(0,                    0,                              MAX_BLUE)
00090 #define COLOR_GREEN             RGB_COLOR(0,                    MAX_GREEN,              0)
00091 #define COLOR_YELLOW    RGB_COLOR(MAX_RED,              MAX_GREEN,              0)
00092 #define COLOR_WHITE             RGB_COLOR(MAX_RED,              MAX_GREEN,              MAX_BLUE)
00093 #define COLOR_BLACK             RGB_COLOR(0,                    0,                              0)
00094 #define COLOR_GREY75    RGB_COLOR(MAX_RED*3/4,  MAX_GREEN*3/4,  MAX_BLUE*3/4)
00095 #define COLOR_GREY50    RGB_COLOR(MAX_RED/2,    MAX_GREEN/2,    MAX_BLUE/2)
00096 #define COLOR_GREY25    RGB_COLOR(MAX_RED/4,    MAX_GREEN/4,    MAX_BLUE/4)
00097 
00098 #endif
